title: The Visit to Victoria of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II and His Royal Highness the Duke of Edinburgh

abstract: A unique record of an outstanding historical event, the arrival in February 1954, of Queen Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh and their subsequent tour of the State of Victoria.
description: A unique record of an outstanding historical event, the arrival at Essendon Airport on 24 February 1954, of Queen Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh and their subsequent tour of the State of Victoria. The film contains footage of the opening of State Parliament; the Royal Command Performance at the Princess Theatre; visits to Hamilton, Benalla, Sale, Traralgon, Yallourn and Mildura; races at Flemington; Flinders Naval Depot; The University of Melbourne.
